titleStmt.title: A true report of the great costs and charges of the foure hospitals, in the city of London in the maintenance of their great number of poore, this present yeare, 1644, as followeth.

notesStmt.note: In fact a report on the five following hospitals: Christ's hospital, St. Bartholomew's, St. Thomas's, Bridewell, and Bethlem.
Annotations on Thomason copy: "Aprill 24th 1644"; "This yeare ther was not psalmes printed as usually".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
